Hello, I'm

Laleh Walizadeh,

I specialize in Frontend & Backend

View My Works Download CV

Expertise and Training in Various Fields

~Frontend~

I work in the frontend as a web developer. This section is very exciting for me because here I can focus on coding, design, and user interaction to help improve the beauty and functionality of websites and applications. This section provides me with the opportunity to create a better user experience for users by using new technologies and enjoy creativity and precision in coding.

~Backend~

I am currently learning Backend and this part of software development is very interesting to me because here I can create complex and powerful systems with the support of servers, databases, and business logic. This section gives me the opportunity to improve the security of data and optimize the performance of systems by utilizing advanced algorithms.

~UI/UX~

Beside web development, I am interested in design too , and I use colors, fonts, images, and various graphic elements to create beautiful and efficient user experiences. I focus on how users interact with systems and applications to provide an optimized and desirable user experience.

~Visual Design~

Design is like a hobby for me, and I create beautiful and captivating graphic designs with creativity and a sense of beauty. This part of my work allows me to bring beautiful and unique patterns to life using graphic design software and present them to users.

My Projects Implementation Process

I usually start with some steps.

  • This step is the most important step in doing any work. you should carefully review all the details of the project and fully understand what is being asked of you, so this is the first step!

  • After I know what I need to do, I start to research about it and brainstorm ideas on how to do it better.!

  • At this stage I structure all the information I got and plan what to do first and what to do next!

  • And now I have a very regular plan for the implementation of the desired project,according to which, I will start working.
